abstract: A company full of former Apple engineers is busy working on, well, who knows what.
snippet: A company full of former Apple engineers is busy working on, well, who knows what.
lead_paragraph: If you’re a reporter, there’s only one thing more frustrating than a stealth start-up, and that’s a stealth start-up run by former Apple employees. You’re basically dealing with people who refuse to confirm or deny anything, including what they ate for breakfast.

headline.main: Agnilux? It Means ‘Won’t Say a Peep’
